What happens when a person gets infected with the H.I.V.? 	5.054715237218584

The prevalence rate of blindness in India is 1.4 percent , to bring this prevalence rate to 0.3 percent the National Programme for Control of Blindness was started by the Government of India.	3.2341266875579175

The main reason of blindness is cataract which is about 55 percent of all blindness.	4.484242796039232

Under the Nation Programme for Control of Blindness the blind people specially cataract affected people are being benefited by surgical operation.	3.403652009175772

Special attention is being paid on the quality of the operation of cataract for which all district hospitals , base hospitals are being converted into Microscopic Centres.	3.7269962892871176

The program of eye test of the 10 to 14 years old school students is being run as a campaign in the beginning of the educational session to reduce the prevalence rate of blindness and the poor students suffering from vision problem are being distributed glasses free of cost.	3.536668349657058

Active help is being taken from all the governmental , non-governmental , voluntary organizations in the Eye Test Programme.	4.643236446448617

The staffs related to eye department are being trained at different levels by the Government of India to reduce the prevalence rate of blindness.	3.7335685400715573

Among the chief reasons of blindness , cataract is 55 percent , vision problems 19 percent , black cataract 4 percent , corneal pathology 7 percent , others 15 percent.	3.9202490463279824

Generally pure lens or its capsule becomes dim or milky with which the light can not reach inside the eyes and the patient can see dim or less.	4.863868125359698

After identifying the patient suffering from cataract doctors and eye helpers perform screening in their hospitals.	4.869487838590998

After that the patient of cataract are operated by eye-surgeon in well maintained hospitals.	5.270189996561964

Spectacles are tested after 6 weeks.	12.324794499054937

Camping is done through government , non-government and voluntary organizations after comprehensive propagation by District Blindness Control Committees.	4.477284852580501

The treatment of cataract is possible through surgery only.	6.340705254761123

Complete lens capsule is taken out in the method of Intra Capsular Cataract Extraction , after the operation spectacles are used post-test.	5.108881233783858

During operation lens is implanted at front of the iris , the frontal part of the eye.	5.541630619834103

In the Extra Capsular Cataract Method , the part of the frontal capsule and the whole of the lens matter is extracted and the posterior part of the capsule is left intact.	4.243411379471298

Lens is fitted in the capsular bag.	7.895087080525052

In the S.I.C.S.Small Incision Cataract Surgery method , a 6 mm tunnel is formed while the rest of the method follows like that of the ECCE-IOL.	3.660579745766613

In black cataract the eye nerves dilapidates gradually.It happens due to extra water pressure in the eye or because of not enough blood reaching in the eye nerves.	5.133043125701452

When the extra pressure is more in the eyes.	7.676840777253227

If somebody suffers from black cataract in the family.	7.889499050892544

In most of the patients the part of the water channel from the eyes are open yet for some reasons the water gets lessened.	5.219706495666726

Internal pressure keeps on increasing and the eye nerves dilapidates , gradually the patient can not see things around , eyesight might also be lost if treatment is not done in time.	4.273194703429791

Seeing rainbow like colorful ovals in light.	6.917960425227794

We will check the eye nerves with special lens or equipment to find how much of damage has occurred.	4.294211325761209

Field test , in which the capacity to see things on the sides while looking straight is tested.	7.032154980328955

The part angle from where the water passes out can be seen through a special lens.	5.146609344157282

Raw birth rate of this state in the period of 1951-1956 was 48 which decreased to become 35 in the period of 1976-1981 and during the years of 1994-2001 this rate lowered more and stayed at 26 only.	3.7241861900277256

Among the districts this rate is the least in Paudi while the most in Haridwar.	5.044838472935596

Gross reproduction rate the number of infants given birth by a woman in her life time which was estimated to be more than 5 for the period of 1971-76 , has been continuously decreasing and in the year of 2001 this number was 3.3.	4.799820996109885

Inter district differences has also occurred less during this period.	5.73010443299661

Raw birth rate and gross reproduction rate has been different in urban and rural areas.	4.063254058458787

It is the desire of son that will affect the future reproductive level of the state.	4.4539771676625985

Generally , birth rate is lower the hilly areas than in the plain areas.	5.061627592641217

About one fourth of the women give birth to the next child within 24 months.	5.586542479840112

Leprosy is a bacteria born contagious disease.	6.484644239684677

The name of this bacteria is microbacterium leprae.	6.218088777042791

Leprosy can affect persons of any age and sex equally.	7.073109686233519

The M.D.T.medicine cures the patient completely by eradicating the leprosy bacteria and prevents the disease from spreading in the society.	4.119391628646076

All the leprosy patients are not contagious.	7.831348972553465

Most of the patients are non-contagious who can not spread the disease , only 15 to 20 percent patients are contagious.	5.086334309981709

Leprosy is comparatively much less contagious than other diseases such as measles , T.B.etc.	4.435458631966585

About 95 percent of the people have the resistance capability to fight leprosy thereby this disease can not happen to them.	5.489968780562277

The main symptoms and identification of leprosy are as follows.	4.18536263460885

A light yellow or discolored reddish spot or stain on skin of the body that has numbness , i.e.the spot has no feeling of pain , inflammation , itching or piercing or cold and hot.	4.216620003859984

Oily shine on the skin.	12.567884534645493

Thickness of cyst on skin , eyebrows , chin , ears.	7.560238354559921

Do not do any hard work for three months after the operation of hernia.	5.622230385952309

Thrilling sensation , numbness or dryness in hands or feet.	6.326553848238585

Occurrence of deformation in the fingers of hands or feet.	4.798118361074174

Initiation and spread of leprosy.	15.590181199599941

Leprosy often starts with a spot or freckle on the body that is numb.	6.573563227074996

If this gets treated in the initial stage then the disease is cured completely and the disability does not get aroused in it that is the main reason of social excommunication.	5.359583723643652

If the treatment is not done due to careless or lack of right information about leprosy then the disease keeps on growing.	3.9068974097936198

Fingers start becoming malformed , wounds erupt in hands and feet and the face starts looking ugly.	4.793541983052498

Most of the people reach the doctor for advice in this stage.	5.327008906870295

Wounds and ulcer form because of no care for the numb and insensitive parts of the leprosy patients.	4.777593659941421

Complete treatment is possible even in the stage of wound and ulcer but the disability and deformity that occurred due to lateness in treatment can not be brought back to the previous state through medicines.	4.24227524566571

Yes , the hands and feet of the disabled person can be formed in such a way through simple operations so that the patient can work again and run his livelihood.	4.985782133819283

Malaria spreads through the bite of female anopheles mosquito.	5.349833314815428

Female anopheles mosquitoes get born in clean water and bites at night.	4.388349400269119

Fever along with shivering and cold comes often the third day.	4.709643528779916

You must change water collected in pots at home once a week.	4.141031954621836

Use mosquito nets while sleeping or apply mustard oil on open parts of the body.	3.867319337473027

Install fine nets on windows of house.	7.998899997962697

Do not let water collect near yourself.	4.50000007703198

If this is not possible then pour some petro-lubricants oil on the collected water.	5.642369990656258

The disease of measles can take a very serious form in developing countries because the death rate due to this is more than 10 percent.	5.358764596686963

Besides the antibody level of mothers and doses of vaccination , considering the incidents of the disease it is recommended by the World Health Organisation to administer the vaccine of measles to the children at the age of nine months.	4.248024844700362

Among the indications and symptoms of measles are included - fever , common symptoms of cold , conjunctivitis , cough , stains inside mouths and the red papules erupting on the skin.	3.7301711490760563

Mumps or contagious perotitis is a kind of serious contagious disease in which a swelling emerges in one or both of saliva glands near the jaws and starts paining.	4.377536710890243

Saliva glands are present inside the cheeks in front of the ears and respectively on the lower surface of the mouth.	5.332463968242588

Besides this , mouth also starts drying up due to mumps.	5.951496671582094

Rubella occurring immediately after birth is generally nominal and stays only for a while.	5.376657753117376

The most clear symptoms of rubella disease light red papules.The most important problem of this disease is that its virus grows very fast as a result of which birth defects occur in children.	4.112980879223527

About 25 to 50 percent of rubella contraction does not get known and when its symptoms emerge they are very light and shows up clearly.	4.301773799792853

MMR vaccines are more effective because there are different related breed in this single virus vaccine.	5.412962728285017

The use of MMR vaccines has been extremely effective.	4.928054264887204

Tuberculosis is a contagious disease.	8.763238563573928

Tuberculosis occurs due to contraction of microbacterium tuberculosis.	9.54872713456543

The tuberculosis disease spreads through air from a tuberculosis patient to a healthy person and can happen to people of any age or sex.	5.649501565660794

A tuberculosis patient can infect 10-15 persons in a year.	6.376564822422112

About 1000 adults die everyday of tuberculosis in India which is much higher than the total number of deaths occurring due to all other diseases.	4.686296807210843

Tuberculosis can occur in any part of the body such as lungs , bones , joints or the sides of lymph nodes.	5.861949873792734

This disease is found commonly in the lungs.	5.4489543165429914

In comparison to any other infected patients the youths die the most of the disease.	4.4433883993163805

Because it is the youths who die the most of it therefore social and economic loss is much.	4.76843102498796

The quantity of tuberculosis in the society is too much.People are afraid to say about this and proper tests could not be get done.	4.399365917638679

In comparison to any other disease there are more orphans due to tuberculosis.	4.602214572232954

According to fresh research 3 lac children in India drop out of school due to this disease every year.	4.730086081110508

The maximum number of tuberculosis patients in the world are found in India.	6.282172928907879

Although the incidence of privilege rate is not available but studies state that the incidence rate is about 256 per lac.	4.127800874208047

The number of women dying of tuberculosis is more than the deaths caused by all other reasons combined.	4.623049481622076

This has been found in fresh studies that one lac women are thrown away from homes because of tuberculosis.	4.120384980266195

In comparison with healthy humans the danger of tuberculosis in HIV positive humans increases 5 times.	5.139746003843528

Tuberculosis infected patients should be treated with the DOTS strategy.	6.745339689573518

Coughs of 3 weeks or more is the chief symptom of tuberculosis of the lungs.	5.744810469990522

The easy way of diagnosis of tuberculosis of the lungs is three times test of the phlegm.	4.979891369197421

The bacteria of the tuberculosis comes out of the patient in the form of droplets on coughing or sneezing.	6.233478938454042

The bacteria out in the air enters into healthy humans through breath and infects the healthy person with tuberculosis.	5.4191883812672605

Diagnosis is done by testing the bacteria of tuberculosis in the phlegm , X-ray is also used if necessary.	5.602133943553987

List of training test centres where cancer can be tested.	3.1363303443433597

Tuberculosis can be completely cured.	10.399878650679392

If the patient does the treatment regularly.	9.131688486254506

There is treatment for tuberculosis but on recovering a little the patient quits treatment.	4.653488496264501

Treatment in tuberculosis is now done through the DOTS strategy.	5.305656939700029

In DOTS strategy patient is administered medicines under the direct care of the health workers.	5.450796625166165

Which is called DOTS Directly Observed Treatment with Short course chemotherapy.	3.168706558545097

As is revealed from the name - Directly Observed Treatment with Short course chemotherapy means that patient takes short courses of anti-tuberculosis drugs in presence of health worker.	3.2788692401969306

There are two stages in the treatment of tuberculosis.	7.7310115230756

Intensive phase which goes on for 2-3 months.	9.60645390295629

Continuation phase is of 4-5 months which depends on the category of the treatment patient is taking.	6.929907692567903

Under this program these medicines are taken thrice a week on alternate days for 2-3 months intensive phase.	4.756665399574765

After this phlegm is tested which if found negative , the patient is issued anti-tuberculosis drugs once in a week in the calendared multi-blistered combo pack.	3.980327452419873

Remember , the first dose of the weekly pack has to be taken before the health worker.	5.569662730912071

During the continuation phase after two months phlegm should be tested and also after the treatment is complete.	5.385293399742817

You will watch the patient during the period of continuation phase.	5.755218245074549

The best way to check the disease is that if all the phlegm patients are made negative then the patient can not infect and whoever human is having coughs of more than three weeks then he should be encouraged to take DOTS after the three phlegm test.	4.2402416818135

The need of caesarean operation for the delivery.	5.553149022031705

Complications while the operation , need to remove the uterus.	8.519463609443457

Excessive bleeding post delivery.	10.99386037021888

Getting anaemic owing to excessive bleeding.	8.052895194746622

Increase in the size of fibroid.	9.498856138861555

Many times the cure of uterine glandular swelling is problematic.	5.138274541727352

The size of uterus also increases in ovarine knot-endometriosis , pregnancy edinomyosis etc.but a skilful gynaecologist can easily find out the disease after a careful examination.	3.722772652453286

The following tests are important for fibroid.	7.4820679516839625

Sonography through abdomen or vagina transabdominal and transvaginal.	5.295320168912203

Laparoscopy , hysteroscopy , M.R.I.if needed.	8.046548367256058

H.S.G.if the doctor thinks essential.	7.435840522238222

After finding out the condition of fibroid in the uterus with these tests , it can be ascertained by which method it can be removed.	5.827263528508347

Mere presence of the glandular swelling is not a prerequisite for its removal.	5.046378998261194

If the symptoms are not appearing then the woman can be counselled and can be asked to come for check up after some time , this treatment in itself is satisfactory.	4.553913816814928

There is a knot , and therefore it has to be removed , it is not necessary.	5.046950368050143

If the knot is very big and is getting bigger continuously , if the woman is panicking , the symptoms increase , the symptoms of bleeding , pain and pressure appear , then only it should be removed.	4.637123392569367

If the sub mucous fibroid is small then it can be removed with the help of uterine hysteroscopic endoscopy.	3.972914324715566

The fibroid can also be removed with the help of lasers.	6.76926380048715

There are two types of operations for fibroid.	5.753374634033783

Myomactomy removal of knot only , this operation is done with hysteroscopy or laparoscopy by doing laparotomy opening stomach.	4.67412013448579

Just the tumor is removed in case of young aged females who do not want more children.	5.811582442997349

Hysterectomy : If the age is not less , the tumor is very big and there is no need of having more children then the entire uterus is removed together with the tumor.	4.281870069279543

Medication is provided to decrease bleeding and for pain relief and iron is given for treating anemia.	5.787940189465601

Some special injection and medicine can be given to reduce the size of the fibroid.	6.396389194474074

But due to these medicines the symptoms of bone weakness and menopause are produced.	6.671216932834558

The condition becomes as before on stopping the medicine.	6.914235724584748

The modern treatment laparoscopic myolysis through laser Nd-YYAG.	5.75026330510226

The blocking of uterine artery ambolization.	9.114273506539146

In modern treatment the uterine artery is blocked by putting poly vinyl particles or gel foam powder through a pipe entered through the thigh artery after anaesthesising it.	2.791578983660693

By blocking the uterine artery the blood supply available to the tumor gets obstructed and the tumor reduces up to 60 %.	4.56631962309586

A skilful gynaecologist is capable of doing proper treatment after considering everything.	5.777458624814855

Therefore , it is unnecessary to be scared of leiomyoma disease.	4.649499174842381

The investigation of the secrets of brain -.	7.183586313524691

If we gradually cut open with a saw and separate the upper part of the skull of a man after making him unconscious on an operation table then by peering inside we can ourselves see the live brain with our own eyes.	3.533071644954942

Similarly , neuro-surgeons operate the brain by cutting the skull bones with saw and drill.	4.610298770160506

Bacterial dysentery occurs from a special type of bacteria bacilli.	8.540403162260509

Many things are of just the sort as the inner kernel of the walnut seen after cracking it.	4.403502475904198

Through the creative capacity or the assistance of the brain itself Einstein , C.V.Raman , Tagore and Shakespeare could produce their extreme original and unique ideas.	3.4642557556684

By look so simple but how wonderful is the brain in work capacity.	5.555264586088684

On investigating any part of brain with microscope we will see that it is mainly made of just one type of cell , neuron or nerve cell.	5.09226321567153

In bacterial dysentery there is repeated discharge of fecus consisting of blood and phlegm.	4.369198103785309

Disease of bacterial dysentery is more rampant in places of temperate environment.	5.123924954870094

The disease of bacterial dysentery occurs more in monsoon season in India.	5.1693054201616935

In the main part of the brain all the life processes keep taking place and a very small center or nucleus controls all of them in the same way as in any other normal cell.	4.8325632459123335

In women , men and all the aged people the disease of bacterial dysentery occurs in similar manner.	5.1066892381959175

By disrupting the phlegmatic action of the large intestine and the phlegmatic action of the end part of the small intestine the bacteria of the disease of bacterial dysentery produce solvency in them.	4.021985857537531

The matter which fascinated Kahal the most , that was the mutual network process of the nerve cells.	4.594964426684168

In this immense crowd of cells one cell actually does not touch any other cell.	4.104778887515465

The axon of one appears to be going very near to the other cell but there always remains a certain distance between the two.	4.914778546164278

Kahal studied these network places with great minuteness , which later on were given the name of synapse by Sir Charles Sherrington.	4.571425461664121

How does the information or signal reach from one cell to the other cell ?.	5.033815834973636

There are special chemicals or neurotransmitters which do the work of messenger in this synapse.Henry Dale and Otto Loewi made an important discovery by finding acetylcholine.	3.4925294687467967

Consciously a valley has been left between every two nerve cell so that the electric impulse can not cross by jumping over , it has to take the help of a chemical messenger and then alone the signal can get forwarded.	4.334918707926512

After all why the interference of these chemical substances in the electrical communication system ?.	4.664071113763818

If we think deeply then this one fact comes up that in this system the information travels in one direction only , not haphazard.	4.038820162507502

Every synapse gives unidirectional instruction , because the chemical substance can be secreted from the end of the axon only.	4.41388428452008

In fact in axon the electricity can be conducted equally from both the directions just like wire.	3.9402226997046186

But the direction gets decided at every synapse , because the chemical messenger which can cross the valley is present at the end of axon and not in the body of the next cell.	4.203432252375123

Thus the signals can never cross the synaptic valley in the opposite direction.	4.157060347887966

Without this directional instruction the signals running between the millions of cells from both the directions then will create ultimate chaos.	3.757498908817417

The second benefit is that because of this chemical process there is a delay of approximately the thousandth part of a second or 1.0 milli second.	5.030350227801451

This way the signals can be sequenced with respect to time.	4.700332812713253

The more the synapses in a neuronal circuit , the slower would be the communication in them.	3.9469585258230557

Synapse has one more use as well.	8.577373822392786

Because of one chemical substance coming medially we can easily interfere in the communication system of brain.	4.449806106510233

These chemical substances are called medicines.	9.906878070913532

Many medicines given by the doctors today - like anaesthesia to make unconscious , tranquilizers for inducing sleep and peace , and many intoxicating substances affect these synapses only.	3.7250038837250914

Why the action site of these medicines are synapse and not the nerve cell itself , to understand it will not be now difficult.	4.850849681950609

Therefore the effect of these medicines are more in those regions only where there is dense net of synapses.	4.985833557470235

The person afflicted with the disease of bacterial diarrhoea suddenly becomes victim of intense stomach pain and dysentery.	5.599274171843945

Every cell in itself appears to be very simple as a unit , but the complex mass of thousands of crores of cells give birth to unlimited possibilities by connecting mutually.	4.20744113424811

Perhaps this only is the physical basis of our intelligence , consciousness and memory.	4.420794396119882

From the point of view of creation we can divide the brain into many parts.	3.279369002394034

Because of being enclosed in a box of bones at one end of the body it is not easy for the brain to keep a direct contact with all the distant parts of the body.	4.7605255330722995

Therefore the role of our spinal cord connected with brain in the form of an extension branch is very important.	4.66338814651016

Like a thick white rope from the neck to the lower part of the back , spinal cord is safe in the spinal bones.	4.594948641807599

At regular interval , through the medium of 31 spinal nerves from both its sides spinal cord has contact with the entire body.	4.696604553040272

Each moment our spinal cord keeps receiving information from skin and other organs , and each moment that keeps sending proper instruction to our muscles.	3.8415010319649907

The spinal cord finishes many normal work on its own on this basis , it does not disturb the brain for everything.	4.682913695655496

For example , it maintains a proper tension in our muscles so that we can keep standing erect.	4.706306538349879

We withdraw hand when all of a sudden a pin pierces finger.	5.350308375003169

This reflex action occurs at the level of spinal cord.	7.04270367214726

The simplest and basic example of the work method of nervous system is this reflex action only.	4.7646814283062175

Apart from this the main use of spinal cord is like a highway alone.	4.7315740223000375

Thus the consequence of minor injury on spinal cord can be serious.	4.265478981726415

But now let us reach to the brain moving above the spinal cord.	4.9560842555310725

The brain starts just as we enter the head.	6.0056370985458845

Or let us say that the spinal cord gets converted into brain.	6.940607121562576

On seeing it appears as if the brain is like a very big walnut resting on a strong stem or branch.	5.5087479909031325

Therefore we can divide the brain into 2 parts.	4.60179483988257

One is this straight stem or brain stem and the second is the main part or cerebrum resting on it.	4.675833135152641

In fact brain stem seems to be similar to the spinal cord , and it is also situated in its straight line , but it is divided into three parts if we see attentively.	4.606447016598154

The various centres which control our internal life processes are present in this alone.	4.7572086417501875

Like , breathing , beating of heart , controlling of blood pressure , digestion of food etc..	6.015403243282352

A sudden jerk or injury on the medulla can therefore lead to death in a moment.	4.5384670182336135

But there is nothing to get scared in this.	5.7702817960025605

Nature has placed this very important control-room in a very safe place at the center of the head.	4.818872026912239

At times in scooter or road accident the neck gets jerked very severely , and medulla stops doing its work on getting damaged.	3.358494178422808

The ordinary looking injury becomes the reason of immediate death.	7.236458318114263

The same happens when the criminals are hanged.	5.856939316858243

Medulla alone is the originating place of 7 out of 12 cranial nerves as well.	5.035318078247036

The cranial nerves control the muscles of face , tongue , shoulders etc., bring auditory signals from the ears and controls many other internal organs.	4.377425530507642

If we cross the medulla oblongata from top then pons and mid-brain come.	4.005263209915744

Mid-brain and pons mainly work as junction.	7.527439895708914

In a way here many small branches emanate from the main stream of nerves or highway.	4.322129473214514

Like a skilful computer cerebellum does two very important jobs.	4.855961404649128

First , because of its support only we are able to maintain our balance by standing on just two lags.	5.183492323123252

We do not fall even when fleeing , running , doing acrobats , bending forward - backward.	4.666612980878375

Second , this cerebellum only adjusts all our voluntary actions very minutely.	4.276990994947357

Cerebellum does their fine adjustment with the voluntary actions.	6.369533324838894

Earlier we mentioned 12 cranial nerves out of which 7 had their origin from medulla.	5.075196680492651

Similarly 4 more emanate from pons mid-brain.	6.495139457223476

Their work is to control the muscles responsible for rotating the eyes and to carry sensation from the face.	5.6809048076311806

Now after crossing the brain stem we reach the most huge and main part of the brain - cerebrum or fore-brain.	4.6214943629339595

From the unconscious state we have come to the conscious state.	5.918473152739987

From darkness to light.	14.046313907825192

We have no intuition of whatever is happening in the brain-stem or cerebellum.	6.0324484465376855

As if we are sleeping in a very deep sleep.	8.036600937155864

But just on reaching the level of cerebrum we become awake.	7.923322161578437

We start feeling comfort , sadness.	9.959611347920186

We feel that we are doing all the works willingly and not like a machine.	5.400453865584231

We start saying I am there , I am doing , I am liking it.	4.586050254113916

Does any machine feel like this ?.	8.64813518224259

None of the organisms have as developed cerebrum as is ours.	5.8840730917752575

Let us forget for a moment the difference of small and big and place the brains of mouse and brain close by and see.	3.8161717176649277

The brain stem and other parts appears to be similar in both.	6.89198538807106

And why should not it be  After all both have to control respiration , heart , food , blood pressure etc..	4.491219048051072

While jumping and running the rat also has to maintain the balance of its body.	5.406639378353421

But when we look at the cerebrum we can feel that there is a huge difference between mouse and man.	4.712046157926399

Our cerebrum has become so huge that it has almost covered all other parts of the brain.	5.163728518118697

Because of this surprising growth of cerebrum the brain of man seems to be the biggest in proportion to body.	4.858718580233722

Although the brain of whale and elephant are certainly bigger than ours.	4.353071882090113

The weight of brain of our closest relative , monkeys , is just half a kilogram.	4.523631567152268

The weight of the brain of whale is 8000th part of the total weight of its body while the weight of our brain is around 50th part of the weight of our body.	4.918650972743316

If the bodies of whale and man are made equal then the human brain would look bigger even more than 150 times of the brain of whale.	4.522825911044953

There is one such speciality in cerebrum which has been a riddle for us even now.	5.288564906590686

This is divided into two parts , which we call the right and the left cerebral hemispheres.	5.336661887186629

Strange thing is this , that the right hemisphere is connected to the left half of the body and controls that alone while the left hemisphere is connected to the right half of the body.	4.580510578879862

All the nerves traveling to and fro have to cross the middle line to go to the other side.	4.0983940015925935

This very system is found in all the organisms.	10.532478793801944

The effect of an injury in the right half of the head is seen in the left half of the body.	5.94979181701359

Similarly , on pricking a needle in the left hand its pain can be felt by the right cerebral hemisphere.	5.478371286084963

Like a modern office in the cerebrum also the division of labor has been done in a very good manner.	4.834410512252954

The upper thick surface of 3 mm is called cortex and the maximum nerve cells accumulate in this only.	3.9560807591236915

In the rest inner part the net of wire like nerves are spread.	4.2993427503973125

The small masses of some cells only may be seen somewhere in middle.	4.65355485327256

The most posterior part of this cortex does the work of vision , while a very small part at the center does hearing.	5.085642650576047

The system of olfaction is at the lower surface.	7.137270416519215

But we should not forget that neither light nor sound or smell can reach in the brain.	4.588612348670558

Only the electric impulses are reaching there through the nerves.	5.020252399052682

So who is seeing , hearing everything while sitting in our cerebrum ?.	6.409828975250635

Is one more small man is sitting inside the human brain ?.	5.2833877405206815

This is a complex riddle by which since time immemorial both scientists and philosophers are being perplexed.	3.638527266720077

Approximately 1 cm wide and 6 cm long strip on the surface of the central part of the cerebrum is called ` motor cortex ' and all the muscles of the other half of the body is being controlled from here alone.	4.630665548713837

The representation of body here also is inverted only : head down and legs up.	4.870411547950228

What is the secret behind this chaotic system , even no one knows this nicely.	4.059734958301742

It can happen that one day you may solve this mystery.	5.311411906609966

A similar strip near the motor cortex is called ` sensory cortex ' where all the sensations from the other half of the body come.	4.841171931312414

But if thought attentively the sensation on being produced in the finger nerve reaches sensory cortex after crossing spinal cord and brain stem at great speed.	4.039048284699879

Then only we realize pain.	9.00983643969865

The pain is in finger , this is only a natural illusion so that we immediately protect our own finger.	4.766129583035663

Roughly we can conclude this , that our nervous system works in the same way as any telephone system.	5.131306748976158

If the wire gets severed in the middle then the entire communication of that area gets disrupted.	5.115052274587688

Similarly , the moment a nerve between the brain and any organ gets severed the transfer of signals stops that very moment.	3.9628457321548254

We can not move our hands and feet even if we feel like.	5.978134887130092

This is called paralysis.	10.434718265408023

Only the one which establishes the communication between the two has been cut.	5.320480956753402

Similarly , now even if we prick needle in the finger or burn it we will not feel any pain.	4.810864873505937

Similarly , we can easily estimate as to what could be the consequence if any part of the nervous system gets injured or any disease occurs.	5.129206523802526

In today 's mechanical era this is only natural that we compare the various organs of our body with the instruments used in day today life.	3.9640391660298597

We say that heart is like a pump , eyes like a camera , nerves are like electric wires.and brain ?.	4.525870934054738

Quickly the answer would be that the brain is a computer.	7.11749184771009

But are the methods of both same ?.	8.216789135209599

In future could such advanced super computers be made which would have intelligence and consciousness like us ?.	4.069003491133847

Does the brain and computer have the only difference of small and big , or do they have some principle differences between them which is not possible to obliterate ?.	4.485820498626857

Such interesting questions today are of pervasive importance.	6.787305080533764

In the efforts to solve the questions , on one the hand the development of computers is getting a lot of help as well.	4.677992187212764

Right there on the other hand we have also started to understand the secrets of brain in a better way.	5.001226751011268

In schools and colleges also children must be encouraged to make models of aeroplanes , steam engines , radio etc.so that while playing they should get familiar with the basic construction of these.	3.6580239124780864

Why not we study a small model of brain before understanding an incredible computer like the human brain ?.	3.9637451851842855

We should make a child and computer sit together and ask both of them to do the same work , multiply 9 by 9 , and whatever the answer comes go on multiplying that with 9 again.	3.748458293469076

The computer will start working according to the instruction and it will continue working till the time we do not switch that off.	5.36568259976013

But the child will throw away his paper and pencil in a few minutes and will in fact start questioning you , oh , why are you making me do this useless work.	3.7695622224426453

What does this mean : I am tired , leave , I will not do anymore.	4.606756017836474

If we still insist him then he will start doing mistakes , while he also very well knows the methods to multiply same as that of computer.	3.8895713376968337

The child soon gets bored with useless work.	5.305277890699875

There is unlimited variation in his thinking , not definiteness like computer.	4.668382886893353

He will suddenly find out a new solution to any question which no one had told him before.	4.5368413788315

One more interesting thing is that the ability to commit mistakes is also in brain alone , not in computer.	5.139880172525733

In future it will ever be able to reach , there is doubt in it.	5.612677755649752

It seems as if language is the highest achievement of the human brain.	4.521806706043664

Scientists at present are trying to make our closest relatives chimpanzees learn the language , but it is clear that compared to us this ability is negligible in them.	4.030192274239711

In the past few years Roger Sperry has amazed everyone by doing some very important experiments directly on human brain.	3.4631171029464425

While receiving the Nobel Prize in Stockholm on December 8 , 1981 he told in his speech that the beginning of all the studies started with those patients who used to get very intense epileptic strokes and no medicine was benefitting them.	3.8042775067109083

When there was no way out it was finally decided as to why should not the corpus callosum-the bridge connecting both the cerebral hemispheres be cut in the middle , so that at least the unwanted excitement occurring on one side should not spread to the other side.	3.6191257907444534

The daring with which this operation was done much more surprising than that were the results.	4.634515152918921

Though we certainly get description of two-headed animals and demons in ancient stories but no one knows as to how will a person with two brains or split brain think actually.	3.5858506204031153

Both the hemispheres of cerebrum continued fulfilling their responsibility by controlling the respective halves of the body.	3.633351792331291

But after an in-depth study this surprising conclusion was clear that there is a huge difference in the capabilities of both the hemispheres.	4.409175599100665

Everyone at least know this that the ability of both of our hands are not equal.	6.584464947377918

In maximum people the straight or right hand is much stronger and dexterous.	4.793741257683652

The same thing has also been seen in all the animals.	7.566620681742663

It can easily be estimated by this that our left hemisphere is more effective , and like a class monitor it has command over the other hemisphere.	4.611940835611619

If we consider the subjects being taught in the school then the division between hemispheres would be like this -.	3.650573742186968

Left hemisphere - language speaking , cognizing the meaning of the words written and heard , maths , analysis of problems , estimation of time.	3.783361591354882

Right hemisphere - geometry , painting , instrumental music , organization of facts , estimation of space.	4.293075146030286

Whatever we study in class generally gets accumulated in the right or left hemisphere according to this area division.	5.2476183826380325

But because of being connected with corpus callosum the knowledge of one is always available for the other when needed.	4.545786659895963

On the contrary the matter of the patients of Roger Sperry is in fact indeed exquisite.	5.257503420187861

As a simple example if a pin used to be pierced on the little finger of the right hand and afterwards he was asked to now demonstrate with the left hand that in which finger did he feel the pain then he used to be left dumbfounded.	4.214515249030145

The contact of left hand is with the right hemisphere and it has no knowledge of the piercing of the pin.	5.217354862756034

With how much vigor and hard work scientists are engrossed in studying our brain and how thrilling are their experiments !.	4.151676951172596

In order to free India from polio mellitus virus and to save people from becoming victims of polio in thousands of number every year , the pulse polio program was started by the World Health Organisation which was established in April 7 1948.	3.4872415631478844

The pulse polio program was started on an experimental basis for the first time in Delhi in 1994-95.	4.001217994197591

Being encouraged of the reach of pulse polio and the support received to the pulse polio in Delhi this program was executed in the whole country in 1995-96.	4.511402943799127

The main aim of pulse polio has been only this that no child should be left devoid of taking polio vaccine in hilly places , desert places , forest areas or in any far distanced places.	3.7328533791419827

The pulse polio program will continue for three more years now.	4.908280603782108

In 2000 this number had reached to 265 and by October 2001 only 100 new cases came within the grasp of polio.	4.037361058804148

At the same time in 2001 there were only six such states where new cases of polio were witnessed.	3.680833234423344

Out of these more in Uttar Pradesh 82 cases and after that 13 cases in Bihar had come forward.	4.4720069614259375

Female anopheles mosquito lays its eggs in stagnant water like ponds , lakes , wells , rivers , drains etc..	3.51451812543386

These eggs are very small and they keep floating on the surface of the water.	5.1493251522859875

Generally , the eggs and the larva which come out of the eggs thereafter get a place to hide behind the grass or the plants by the side of water.	4.035306512206216

Larva comes out of the egg in 24-28 hours of the laying of eggs.	6.7917866476734154

Larva gets converted to pupa in 5-6 days , which start taking dips in water.	4.837889215025449

In 2 or 3 days it flies away becoming an adult mosquito from pupa.	4.996027611168524

Adult mosquito rests at 45 degree angle from the surface.	6.391950576976046

This way while becoming mosquitoes from egg their enemy is gambusia fish which eats their eggs in the state of larva , pupa.	3.619913998378785

Tank kept open on the terrace near the house , useless thrown tyres , cooler , kitchen garden , fountains for decoration , pots and vases , broken vessels , uncovered vessels , disposable glasses , stagnant water near hand pump or tap , wells which are not brought into use , cistern of animals , the stagnant water in the paddy fields , the accumulated watering the monsoon season in the tantrum of the trees , the lakes surrounded with grass , marshy land and the stagnant water of the drains are the shelter place of the mosquitoes.	3.13267470933765

High blood pressure is dangerous for health -.	8.549937875281298

Blood pressure is not such an illness that can not be controlled.	6.738663850351411

By adopting a course of abstinence and medicines it is possible to prevent the serious consequences of blood pressure.	4.4481511921358905

Blood pumped from left chamber of the heart circulates in the arteries spread throughout the body and it is the very pressure exerted on the walls of the arteries by blood circulation which is called blood pressure.	5.817209767758882

The pressure generating in the systolic shrinking stage of heart is called systolic blood pressure and the pressure generating in the diastolic expanding stage of the heart , diastolic blood pressure.	4.406519066876315

The systolic blood pressure in a normal person is less than 140 m.m.and the diastolic blood pressure is less than 90 m.m.of mercury.	5.111632743156651

Blood pressure of a normal man should be less than 140  90.	7.262310004487501

We call it increasing situation of systolic blood pressure on systolic blood pressure going above 140 m.m.mercury and increasing situation of diastolic blood pressure on it going above 90 m.m.mercury.	3.35241763182066

In any person either of the two blood pressures the systolic or diastolic can mount up or both the blood pressures can increase together.	3.9208218048737997

These are all named high blood pressure.	5.770206149905856

For the health of a person it is necessary for his blood pressure to be normal.	7.026054341312017

There is pressure on heart as blood pressure mounts up and also there is adverse effect of it on the different parts of body.	4.656852716431993

Whenever there is decrease or increase in the pumping capacity of heart , there is a defect in valve of the heart , blockage in the main arteries emerging from the heart or vessels have contracted in the whole artery system and blood circulation is abnormal , then blood pressure starts mounting up.	5.022579064682861

Hormones oozing from some special endocrinal glands in the body also play an important role in the blood pressure increase.	6.607826989371842

Blood pressure also increases in case of disease in kidneys or their veins.	7.535535610367576

Such blood pressures are called renal blood pressure.	6.896379163932022

Though blood pressure can occur to anyone in any stage - children , youth , middle aged or aged , but generally disease of high blood pressure occurs more in individuals above 40 years of age.	3.974907385227679

In the last 2-3 decades changes brought about in lifestyle , food habits , a stressful lifestyle and a luxurious lifestyle which is increasingly becoming so on a daily basis have played an important role in increasing high blood pressure.	3.1462817068241438

Diabetes : Appropriate lifestyle can also prevent from diabetes.	7.01368192059838

On being afflicted with diabetes either insulin is produced in a very small amount in the body or its effect on our blood cells does n't occur in a suitable amount.	5.33709091486856

Diabetes has two prototypes :.	12.168276127191081

Type 1 Diabetes : which occurs chiefly in children and in less than 20 years of age.	4.813803400745537

In this the insulin factory shuts down and the need of insulin arises for the child afflicted with disease to stay alive.	5.206536605312011

Prostrate enlargement , a common problem of the middle aged -.	9.439493199934493

Prostrate gland made of muscles has a composition exactly like that of the shape of a shirt and surrounds the urinary passage like a collar.	4.76090123084957

In the prostrate gland milk like white fluid substance is made which is carrier of sperms.	4.571268042616315

With increase in age itself the size of prostrate gland also starts increasing.	5.330880725034536

The increased state of the prostrate gland is called B.P.H.	5.744444312222401

In B.P.H.disease repeated urge to urinate is a common symptom so its reason is that prostrate gland is very close to the urinary bladder and stays surrounding the urinary passage.	4.198731352933351

When size of prostrate gland increases , its pressure is also exerted on the urinary passage due to which urinary passage contracts and becomes thin and small.	4.662690509508213

As a result , urine is able to come out easily and patient starts facing problems while urination.	5.112761864591823

After that there is swelling in the wall of the urinary bladder.	7.168054678568393

Due to these complications a variety of difficulties start happening to the patient.	4.591802683626925

Hepatitis - B can be more dangerous than AIDS.	7.546063258673972

Hepatitis-B is a common disease happening worldwide whose virus infects the liver in a serious manner.	4.76044209679573

Virus of Hepatitis-B produce swelling in the liver because of which it can not function properly.	7.155133969049718

This disease is even more infectious than AIDS because it goes very easily into body of another person via blood.	4.101489259767893

Just one virus of Hepatitis B is enough to spread this disease.	6.049128687987129

Other than blood it also spreads by other fluids and liquid substances coming out of body.	4.639032086394945

Like defecation , mother 's milk , tears , drool and open wounds.	6.678131053367672

By eating medicine on time and by following the advice of doctor 95 % people get better in 6 months.	5.680115653439722

The causes behind spreading of Hepatitis-B are the following :.	7.554590065687112

If blood of infected person is transfused in the body of a healthy person or the shot which was given to an infected person is given to a normal person then this virus goes from the infected person to the healthy person.	4.793288112978788

The most important causes of Hepatitis B happen to be at the time of child birth from the womb of infected mothers.	5.576025787019701

During this , the blood which touches the body of the child , the virus situated in that infected blood goes inside the child as soon as coming in contact with the blood of the child.	4.410078614978973

Along with India in all the countries of Asia this type of infection spreads a lot and new born baby gets infected from infancy itself.	5.028592588608444

In the field of athletics when an infected individual gets wounded and if his blood somehow comes in contact with the blood of a healthy person then it spreads very easily.	4.199151452236166

It also spreads exceedingly among those who consume drugs via needle.	5.0442356766739715

If an applied syringe taken from an infected person is used by another person then virus goes in the healthy person.	3.744950624104448

When someone in man and woman is infected with Hepatitis B and they have unprotected sexual intercourse then by this also the virus goes in the healthy person.	3.9996110609249866

Even 1 part of blood of a person infected with Hepatitis B is capable of spreading Hepatitis B.	5.879681790821016

Hepatitis B is more dangerous than AIDS can be reckoned by this fact that the number of people that die because of Hepatitis B in 1 day is same as the number of people that die with the infection of AIDS in a year.	3.8387050917155685

In India healthy person is also infected with Hepatitis B.	5.89705717287368

In many individuals despite being Hepatitis B positive they do not have the knowledge that they have Hepatitis B because this virus is unable to affect that individual too much.	4.562402006587102

If Hepatitis B infects young people then 95 % get free of the disease in 6 months only.Only the remaining 5 % stay infected with the disease.	5.218238107707456

Which is called jaundice in common tongue.	6.2708015654201725

Protection of heart -.	22.763077505712616

No matter what , heart should be kept safely because heart is the most important part of body.	5.287087272316183

Heart of human is of four chambers meaning ` left-right auricles ' and ` left-right ventricles '.	4.644111672244189

Between auricles and ventricles special ` valves ' have been made which in reality do the work of gatekeeper.	4.898059956280789

The valve of the left side is called ` mitral ' and valve of right side is called ` tricuspid '.	5.921976516588151

From these blood can go from auricle to ventricle only and can not come back up because by then they are closed.	4.662108146082691

This way at the meeting point of ventricles and main blood-carriers also these valves of the shape of half moon give permission to blood to circulate in the whole body through the medium of the main blood-carriers.	3.980217067776387

Blood is not able to return back into the heart because by that time these valves shut.	5.429458458730901

After all what is the necessity of blood circulation every moment ? 	7.052214597686333

Medical literature says that by complete blood circulation 1200 cc Oxygen is received by every cell that is successful in giving only 5 minutes of life to them , hence it is necessary for blood circulation to get activated again.	4.327160645788402

The blood carriers that take pure blood to all cells are called arteries.	5.038429213023778

Veins ' is name of those blood-carriers that collect blood from all over the body and do the job of returning it back to the heart.	5.0107536569197215

Hence there is no exaggeration of this condition that our heart is greater and more efficient than any human made instrument.	4.75347721220842

What is stress urinary incontinence ? 	6.931842363754973

With increasing age the problem of urine coming out unknowingly can not be overlooked just like that.	5.7245630185788

While finishing daily chores of life , while coughing or sneezing , laughing , while picking up stuff by bending sudden leakage of urine is called S.U.I., that is , stress urinary incontinence.	3.473926491031843

The specialists of International Urology Association have to say that an individual 's muscles and connective tissue which are a support of Urethra , do not remain so capable to be able to support the Urethra.	4.015007227502034

Other than this when sphincter , that works like a valve , during pressure is not able to stay shut then also urine leaks out in some amount.	3.8720518512973405

In Indian women there are around 2.2 crore cases of S.U.I.that do not come forward due to lack of awareness and hesitation related to the disease.	4.573134742725193

By International Urology Association such an estimation has been made that 1 out of 3 women at some point in their life has to face S.U.I.	4.601254626101302

There is a very bad effect of S.U.I.on women in a social , mental and emotional way.	4.6225956476000185

Sometimes their condition becomes so bad that they start feeling scared of getting out of house because of this reason.	4.847574024718613

Due to S.U.I.fear of constant wetness and the stink arising out of it makes them conscious of the huge inconvenience.	4.479902063336925

However this disease has been seen most in women of 35 to 60 years of age.	5.369593926895526

But its not even like it can be considered a problem of increasing age because , due to weakening of pelvis muscles and tissues connected to them on account of pregnancy , labor , continuously picking up heavy things , menopause or obesity , the disease occurs.	4.000215456298767

The doctors from International Urology are of the opinion that there are many other reasons behind S.U.I.	4.998401445342269

Main in which are - pregnancy.	13.165673512874882

During pregnancy some hormones of body weaken the muscles of pelvis.	6.057372538749483

Along with this the weight and pressure of womb also falls on those muscles.	4.998454355553222

The problem of S.U.I.happens to more than half of women during pregnancy.	5.064102685187229

During labor : During the birth of child by the tension from nearby muscles they get torn and worn by which the danger of S.U.I.increases.	4.247277807437366

Due to obesity : On account of much pressure on stomach near the bladder there is tension and by this danger of S.U.I.increases.	3.9514414696630107

According to body ratio people with much weight and patients of terminal obesity have more danger of S.U.I.	4.114799696183569

After menopause weight of women also starts increasing and this becomes the accessorial reason behind occurrence of the disease.	4.792917536556656

Hysterectomy : Due to surgery of uterus also muscles of pelvis can get injured.	5.849789394451093

Main symptoms of jaundice -.	11.168108574567722

In jaundice substance named bilirubin becomes more than normal.	6.071477113514971

As a consequence of which in the gaps of skin , nails , urine and mouth yellowness is seen.	3.892899334104452

Bilirubin named colored substance is made in our body absolutely everyday.	8.264865552393019

The root source of generation of bilirubin are red molecules of blood.	4.225280086717492

The life of red molecules of blood has been considered as about 120 days.	5.504485562130342

They get destroyed after 120 days.	11.566633827667665

On getting destroyed substance named bilirubin is born out of them.	5.351633082800371

Bilirubin keeps going round in our body through the course of blood.	6.843166202047033

Through the course of blood bilirubin reaches our liver.	5.428022610891161

In the liver a bit of bilirubin gets destroyed and some part through the bile juice after reaching small intestine gets mixed with faeces and gives faeces its own color.	4.002575570979877

This is the very reason that the colors of faeces are various.	3.7393792426378196

If there comes an obstruction in the bile duct that makes bilirubin reach the intestine from the liver then this substance does not reach the intestine.	4.013320566233865

As a result color of faeces becomes white.	5.2242883694359925

Faeces becoming white is considered the main symptom of jaundice.	7.177134751865294

In this way some amount of bilirubin while coming out through urine makes urine like itself.	4.23494665366847

As a result of defect in liver the cycle of bilirubin gets disturbed.	4.890306878355426

Consequently , the amount of bilirubin in blood increases , which gets accumulated in body parts like eyes , skin and nails etc.This way these body parts start looking yellow and weakness in body increases.	4.974201681664819

What is conception ? 	17.127737379445904

When the sperms of man meet with the ovum of woman then conception takes place.	4.242148535212096

But before this conception many situations are formed.	7.652088864738694

Firstly the sperms reach the uterus by going through the vaginal canal and enter the fallopian tube.	4.374991444774679

Here in the broad portion of the tube there is mating with the developed eggs which comes out of the ovary.	4.839069035184796

On entering the eggs sperms mix their chromosomes with the egg.	5.416140178739698

The egg gets fertilized and after developing gets converted into a multicelled ball which is called blastocyst.	4.4786717911736575

This gets attached to the surface of the uterus.	6.0155066736069935

The contact with the muscles of the tube and the cilia lining as thin as hair advance the egg towards uterus.	4.481087333005117

The egg does not advance on its own.	5.0941922640787265

Every month many eggs are developed but in hair follicle only one egg is able to develop.	4.7157234397883165

The other eggs get squeezed on their own.	5.337746053186443

Lakhs of sperms enter the uterus but maximum get destroyed due to the reason of the acidic substances inside.	4.518477826105054

One or two out of whatever sperms escape get attached to the outer layer of the egg and the moment conception takes place , it puts a ban on the entry of other sperms.	3.9787707815520728

Following situations come in conception.	10.44307336076488

Sperms passes through the uterus and goes to the fallopian tube.	7.267394574403041

The egg enters the tube.	9.338681590434968

The sperm makes the egg conceive.	9.01101274311025

The zygote gets divided into two.	9.267127805157143

64 cells of zygote enter inside the uterus.	7.695785911204085

This gets converted into a seed.	7.905558577292375

On reaching its destination the seed gets connected with the surface of the uterus.	4.544493389052786

Here it gets nutritive substances from the blood cells of the mother.	6.632558935871355

The family planning program was started in the country from 1951.	6.6133507170782835

Its aim was only to plan the population.	7.56300660049033

Afterwards for the attainment of the missions of the program it started being used for mass education and propaganda.	4.704965757731973

In the decade of seventies by stressing on vasectomy extreme strictness was done in the achievement of goals.	3.811929566582095

As a result opposition was produced among masses towards family planning program.	4.083055308111479

During the seventh plan year 1985 - 90 in place of the family planning program the program was given the identity of family welfare.	4.839971560831952

In this special emphasis was given on the health related needs of women of reproductive age and children of less than five years.	5.027994944129942

In 1985 - 86 pervasive vaccination was started.	8.973435984810388

In pervasive vaccination the aim was fixed to bring down the death rate and sickness of young children from such diseases whose prevention is possible through vaccines.	4.163230206963919

Thereafter by looking at the benefits of this program in the decade of nineties child safety and safe motherhood C.S.S.M.was prepared and implemented from 1992 - 93.	3.6469044305029

In the present times all the family welfare services continuing from before were kept implemented.	4.092575481791561

In it reproductive health , youth health , sex generated disease , infection of reproductive system and AIDS were included.	3.93628536576193

It was given the name of reproduction and child health.	6.150192075982932

Reproduction and child health program was implemented in the region.	6.678514103438178

In the place of goal oriented method from the year 1997 community needs are ascertained on the basis of assessment policy.	4.296282546085823

The work plan of health workers only would be the base of all the plans.	6.232269013071141

After unifying the plans created on the sub centres it would be given the form of district work plan.	5.725616881194073

The district work plans together would take the form of state work plan.	5.708116178432703

In order to supply the goods to state the national plan would be based on the state work plan.	3.653330575889889

The partner plan is the form of proposal.	11.192942848155736

The principle essay of the ninth plan published by the planning commission has been written.	4.0652635149186125

It is written in it that the government investment during the eighth plan for family welfare is reducing.	4.622958950854706

The extra expenditure of the eighth plan has also been less than that of the seventh plan.	5.167265161477566

This situation looks even more unsatisfactory.	7.371158365217039

At every level there is a need of upliftment of health care system.	5.539559438017009

How to identify fast breathing rate ? 	8.433514706515899

In child of less than two months of age the rate of breathing being 60 per minute or more.	5.045899140129482

In the age of 1 to 5 years of age in the condition of pneumonia 40 per minute or more.	4.650763234296517

The meaning of the movement of ribs is that the movement of the lower part of the chest certainly towards inside with breathing.	5.102629928089351

Only the soft tissue between the ribs or the upper part of the collar bone goes inside with the breathing of the child.	4.087414852347241

This will not be called the movement of the ribs.	7.403404951560116

The movement of the ribs have been defined in the form of sub costal suction or pull.	4.926620366474422

The movement of ribs in small children is normal thing.	6.109957879448885

The sight if ribs very clearly very deep and easy to see may be the sign of pneumonia.	4.787454170756668

If you are doubtful about the ribs of the child then change the position of the child and check again.	5.178681678435633

If the body of the child is bent from waist then the decision of the speed of the lower part of the chest is doubtful.	5.0475317240153625

Change the position of the child in such manner that he keeps lying straight in the lap of the mother.	4.436054983224041

Despite this if the movement of the ribs is not seen clearly then it should be believed that the ribs are not moving.	4.649919787836139

the movement of the ribs is important only when it moves continuously and is seen clearly.	5.170213491462537

If this is seen only in the unhappy state of the child or while it is taking nutrition and not in the state of rest then believe that there is no rib movement.	5.1309237008704285

When there is a desire to take breath then then take the breath slowly by removing the bandhas.	5.3413868358495105

It takes less than one minute to bring the food or liquid material into the door of the mouth.	4.447367059625936
